@vymair @ActiveNick @Marisha_Ray What Scott said. Also, keep in mind that monks are actually the only melee class able to attack more than once per round, by default, at first level. Other classes can choose to dual wield but it's not as good as martial arts until they can get the fighting style.

@mattcolville My setting centers an Arabic fantasy region, rather than a European one. The European nations are recently arrived colonizers and refugees, while the Arabic folk live in an ancient and powerful caliphate that is the center of the known world.

@DungeonCommandr I was 11, my only player was my 7 year-old brother, and I ran Keep on the Borderlands. I didn't have a PHB, DMG, or MM, though. I was working off the B2 module and a used copy of AD&D Unearthed Arcana that I found at a garage sale.
